itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by UFC announcer Jon Anik to discuss how UFC was able to come back as the first live sports during the pandemic, they discuss the last three UFC cards, and they break down this weekend’s fights as well as predic...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by UFC announcer Jon Anik to discuss how UFC was able to come back as the first live sports during the pandemic, they discuss the last three UFC cards, and they break down this weekend’s fights as well as predict the winners.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by UFC announcer Jon Anik to discuss how UFC was able to come back as the first live sports during the pandemic, they discuss the last three UFC cards, and they break down this weekend’s fights as well as predict the winners.
